author: y19y19
body:
There are a few changes:

1) We realize the previous model uploaded does not allow for batching jets for making multiple inferences simultaneously. After discussed with author Alexander De Moor and his PI, we figure out a new model that allows for the batching. I am uploading the new model here.
2) Add files under /models/unifiedparticletransformer_ak4 for loading the model onto triton server.
3) put a link under the original UParTAK4 folder, links to the /models/unifiedparticletransformer_ak4/1/model.onnx
title: Modify the UParT model, add files necessary for SONIC triton server and put the model in model/ folder
